data.title: AHSEC COI SERVICE
data.text: 1. The admission on transfer is facilitated to only the regular students who passed the Higher Secondary First Year Examination 2024 and is admissible only from permitted/recognized institution to recognized/2nd Year Permitted institution. (Student from other Board/Council registered under COBSE can also apply). A TRANSFER OF PARENTS IN SERVICE In case of transfer of parents in service, attested copy of order of transfer from competent authority and certified joining report from the controlling officer after joining the new place of posting is to be submitted/ uploaded. B UNAVOIDABLE CHANGE OF RESIDENCE OF PARENTS. In case of unavoidable change of residence of parents (in the event of death of parent, copy of death certificate has to be submitted/ uploaded). In this connection a certificate is to be submitted/uploaded from the concerned revenue authority where from transfer is sought. D CHANGE OF PLACE / RESIDENCE DUE TO MARRIAGE. (FOR FEMALE CANDIDATES ONLY ) In case of female candidates, change of place/residence due to marriage, candidates shall have to submit/uploaded a n affidavit to this effect. 4. Application shall be considered if subject(s) proposed by the student is / are permitted in the recognized / permitted institution of the council to where transfer is sought. 6. Application for transfer will not be considered if the institution falls within the same city/town area except in medical ground.
